text: Aladdin and His Wonder Lamp () is a 1906 French silent movie directed by Albert CapellaniAladdin and His Wonder LampPeter Buse. The Camera Does the Rest: How Polaroid Changed Photography and stars Georges Vinter, Liane de Pougy, and Paul Capellani. ==Actors== * Georges Vinter as The Lover * Liane de Pougy as The Princess * Paul Capellani ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:French movies Category:1906 movies Category:French silent movies
title: Aladdin and His Wonder Lamp
